346.sentence: granted , i have only used this dvd player for about 2 hours setting it up for my mom for christmas , but that was long enough for me to find problems with this dvd player .

347.sentence: first , the player did not allow me to access the menus of dvds .

350.sentence: in addition , it only seems to work if you 're about five feet away from the player , although that may have been just the batteries that came with it .

352.sentence: after less than 24 hours it turned out to be a huge disappointment , for myself and for my parents , for whom it was a gift .

353.sentence: it played only one out of three dvd 's without problems , the other two being afflicted by a number of glitches .

354.sentence: both of the problem dvd 's would repeatedly freeze during playback , while the counter on the player kept going .

355.sentence: one also exhibited extremely slow speed when going to the menu .
